tddt.catalog.xmlhandler

Class XMLWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tddt.catalog.xmlhandler.XMLWriter

  • public class XMLWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    The XMLWriter class is used to create a new or append an existing catalog of TDDT exercises.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kai Holzinger

    • Constructor Summary

      XMLWriter()

      This method appends an existing XML file.

    • Method Detail

      • appendXMLFile

        public void appendXMLFile(java.io.File file,
                          java.lang.String exerciseName,
                          java.lang.String aDescription,
                          java.lang.String newClass,
                          java.lang.String classname,
                          java.lang.String newTest,
                          java.lang.String testname,
                          java.lang.String babystepsvalue,
                          java.lang.String babystepstime,
                          java.lang.String trackervalue)
                   throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                          java.io.IOException,
                          org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                          javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        This method appends an existing XML file.
        Parameters:
        file - The XML file which is appended.
        exerciseName - The name of the new exercise.
        aDescription - The description of the new exercise.
        newClass - The class code of the new exercise.
        classname - The name of the class
        newTest - The test code of the new exercise.
        testname - The test name of the new exercise
        babystepsvalue - Should be true or false, depending if babysteps should be turned on or not.
        babystepstime - The time the user will have for each phase
        trackervalue - This could be the setting for timetracker, but right now its more or less a dummy.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        java.io.IOException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException

      • newXMLFile

        public void newXMLFile(java.io.File file,
                       java.lang.String exerciseName,
                       java.lang.String aDescription,
                       java.lang.String newClass,
                       java.lang.String classname,
                       java.lang.String newTest,
                       java.lang.String testname,
                       java.lang.String babystepsvalue,
                       java.lang.String babystepstime,
                       java.lang.String trackervalue)
                throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                       javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        This method creates a new XML catalog.
        Parameters:
        file - The XML file which is created.
        exerciseName - The name of the new exercise.
        aDescription - The description of the new exercise.
        newClass - The class code of the new exercise.
        classname - The name of the class
        newTest - The test code of the new exercise.
        testname - The test name of the new exercise
        babystepsvalue - Should be true or false, depending if babysteps should be turned on or not.
        babystepstime - The time the user will have for each phase
        trackervalue - This could be the setting for timetracker, but right now its more or less a dummy.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
